name: amrikyy-platform
description: AI-powered travel booking platform with crypto payments and enterprise compliance

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../aix-auditor && npm install
scripts.aix-audit:all: node aix-auditor/bin/aix-audit.js amrikyy-agent.aix.json && node aix-auditor/bin/aix-audit.js aix-auditor/examples/test-agent-vulnerable.aix && node aix-auditor/bin/aix-audit.js aix-auditor/examples/perfect-secure-agent.aix

author: Mohamed H Abdelaziz <moe@amrikyy.com>
